name: New Relic
description: Integrate with New Relic to list, get, query and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Applications
tools.description: List New Relic APM applications. Optionally filter by name or health status.

tools.name: Get Application
tools.description: Retrieve details of a specific New Relic APM application by ID. Returns health status, throughput, response time, and error rate.

tools.name: Query Nrql
tools.description: Execute a NRQL query against New Relic Insights. Returns query results as structured data.

tools.name: List Alerts
tools.description: List New Relic alert policies. Returns policy names, IDs, and incident preferences.

tools.name: Get Synthetics
tools.description: List New Relic Synthetics monitors. Returns monitor names, types, statuses, and locations.
